text: Tommy Hazouri (October 11, 1944 â€“ September 11, 2021) was an American politician. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was a member of the Florida House of Representatives from 1974 to 1986. He was Mayor of Jacksonville from 1987 to 1991."Tommy Hazouri, At-Large - Group 3 ," City of Jacksonville, 2021. Retrieved 11 Sept. 2021. Hazouri was born in Jacksonville. Hazouri died on September 11, 2021 at the Mayo Clinic in Rochester, Minnesota from problems caused by a lung transplant at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Jacksonville, Florida Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from lung disease Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:Organ transplant recipients
title: Tommy Hazouri
